page.title: 07Ghosts in Bromsgrove(1)
page.content: John Alex Corbett lived about 100 years ago.When he was alive he built the Chateaux Impney for his wife.He built and owned the Bayer Salt Works.He owned a large playing field in Stoke Prior,he made a law that nobody was going to build on his land but a few years ago someone built on the field.John Corbett now haunts the Chateaux Impney,the Bayer Salt Works and the large playing field.John Corbett rides around on a horse haunting Stoke Prior.He wears a top hat and tail coat.He died when he was building,a ton of bricks fell on his head.He is buried in St.Michael's Churchyard.He starts haunting Stoke Prior.Mr.Leak of Stoke Prior School was working outside the school when he saw the ghost of John Corbett riding on a horse and tried to grab him.
